channel.title: My Study Notes
channel.description: Last 10 notes on My Study Notes

item.title: Module 1 - Intro to Project Management
item.description: 2025-05-08 16:22 Career Identity - the unique value that you bring to the workforce, informed by who you are and what you have to offer, now and in the future made up of: your strengths - I’m a people person, an effective communicator.

item.title: Module 3 - Project Lifecycle
item.description: 2025-05-14 11:47 Project Lifecycle: Initiate the Project define project goals determine resources, people, and other project details get approval from management Make a Plan create a budget set the schedule establish your team, determine roles and responsibilities plan for risk and change Execute an...

item.title: Module 4 - Organizational Structure
item.description: 2025-06-17 09:48 Organizational Structure Organizational structure helps you understand where you fit in, who to communicate with, and how frequently.

item.title: Module 1 and 2 - Project Initiation; Identifying Project Goals
item.description: 2025-06-17 09:52 Module 1: Project Initiation It’s the first step, so it’s important that you set yourself up for success! Recap: It’s a project managers responsibility to identify the project’s goals, resources, and other details, based on discussion with the project stakeholders.

item.title: Module 3 - Working Effectively with Stakeholders
item.description: 2025-06-18 16:23 Exploring project team roles and responsibilities Accessibility, for project managers Over one billion people have a disability, and many disabilities are not immediately visible.

item.title: Module 4 - Essential Project Resources
item.description: Understanding project resource needs Refresher… Typical resources are: Budget People Materials It’s important to figure out the project’s resources before it gets started! It’s essential for planning and making sure your team members have what they need to get their work done, which is one of the ma...

item.title: Module 1 - Kicking Off the Planning Phase
item.description: 2025-07-02 14:17 This module covers: Kicking off the planning phase Setting and reaching milestones and identifying tasks to do so Budgeting process Identifying and planning for risks Documentation Review: Project Initiation Project manager is assigned, Project goals, scope, and deliverables must be...

item.title: Module 2 - Building a Project Plan
item.description: 2025-07-15 18:43 Getting started with a project plan Most project plans are made up of five elements: Tasks Milestones People Documentation Time Scope and goals - Work Breakdown Structure - Management plans - Budget These are connected! Using estimation to set project timelines (Management plans are...
